name: 3rd International Conference on Innovation in Renewable Energy and Power
content: The 3rd International Conference on Innovation in Renewable Energy and Power is set to take place from March 13-15, 2025, in Berlin, Germany. This highly anticipated event promises insightful presentations, thought-provoking discussions, and dynamic networking opportunities. With participants from around the globe, including the United Kingdom, India, Iceland, the United States, China, and Canada, the conference is a unique opportunity to explore global and regional trends, learn about innovative application frameworks, and share your research with an extensive academic community and internationally diverse audience. Topics will include waste recycling energy, energy markets, risk management in the energy sector, marine energy, power systems and automation, smart grids, and more. Whether you present as an oral or virtual speaker, or a poster presenter, you will gain valuable exposure and feedback. For those without a paper to present, attending as a listener offers a chance to gain new ideas and perspectives and find collaborators for future projects. All accepted and registered papers will be published and indexed in the conference proceedings with an ISBN number. Additionally, the Organizing Committee will offer a free city tour, allowing participants to explore Berlin’s vibrant history and culture with a friendly local guide. Important Dates: Abstract Submission Deadline: 27 February 2025 Early Registration Deadline: 12 November 2024 Final Registration Deadline: 06 March 2025 Don’t miss this prestigious event in your calendar of renewable energy conferences—send your abstract today to secure your presentation slot and join a truly international community of experts and innovators.
